src:
Hallan moto que usaban para robar
05 Nov 2019 by Redacción Diario de Cuyo
En un allanamiento en el Barrio Pampa, en Chimbas, policías de la Brigada Sur, al mando del oficial principal Diego Ditieri, dieron con una moto Zanella 125 cc que aparentemente era utilizada por motochorros que atacaban en Rawson bajo la modalidad de arrebato, dijeron fuentes policiales.
text:
They find a motorcycle they used to steal
05 Nov 2019 by Cuyo Daily Writing
In a raid in the Pampa neighborhood, in Chimbas, police officers from the South Brigade, under the command of the main officer Diego Ditieri, found a 125 cc Zanella motorcycle that was apparently used by motocross that attacked Rawson under the modality of rapture, sources said police.
